Pharmacokinetics

Pharmacokinetics ‘effect of body on drug’: absorption, distribution, metabolism and excretion (see also clearance, protein binding and area under curve ).

[xxx check maths!]

For first-order kinetics:

k is the rate constant.

1/k is the time constant, τ.

t ½ = τ * ln(2)

Volume of distribution = V D

Mass of drug = Concentration * V D

dC/dt = kC so dMass/dt = kC * V D

So clearance dVol/dt = kC * V D / C = k*V D = V D /τ

Since clearance also = Dose/AUC (see area under curve ), V D can be calculated:

V D /τ = Dose/AUC

V D = τ *Dose/AUC
